TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit SamlCondition extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示一个在评估 SAML 断言的有效性时必须考虑的条件。

span.span: Represents a condition that must be taken into account when assessing the validity of a SAML assertion.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 安全令牌使用 SAML 断言以及一组在评估 SAML 断言的有效性时必须考虑的条件来指定其声明。 security tokens specify their claims using SAML assertions and a set of conditions that must be taken into account when assessing the validity of the SAML assertion. 类表示单个条件。The class represents a single condition. 是否不得缓存 SAML 断言是条件的一个示例，该条件由 类表示。An example of a condition is whether the SAML assertion must not be cached, which is represented by the class. SAML 规范定义了两个条件，并允许扩展条件集。The SAML specification defines two conditions and it allows for the set of conditions to be extended. SAML 规范定义的两个条件是 和 。The two conditions defined by the SAML specification are and . 若要定义新条件，请从 类派生一个类。To define a new condition, derive a class from the class.

summary.span: 在派生类中重写时，获取一个值，指示此实例的属性是否为只读。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要将 类的此实例设为只读，请调用 方法。To make this instance of the class read-only, call the method.

summary.span: 在派生类中重写时，使此实例为只读。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, causes this instance to be read-only.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用 方法时， 属性被设置为 `true`，并且不能再设置此实例的属性。When the method is called, the property is set to `true` and properties of this instance can no longer be set.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract void ReadXml (System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader reader, System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSerializer samlSerializer, System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer keyInfoSerializer, System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver outOfBandTokenResolver);
